author: icepick
title: I like it!
review:
Overall:  You get sweet stuff.  I love LEGO magnets, but these are pretty overpriced unless you catch them on sale.

Build:  No build...  None whatsoever.  But that also makes it not a terrible experience.

Parts:  I love the magnets, and the figs come with great accessories!  :D

Play:  Really good play.  all kinds of epic battles await with these guys.

Value:  Meh.  Get it on sale, otherwise not worth it.
